attributes.action: Payment Protection  Insurance - Catch the criminals
attributes.additional_details:
The PPI scandal  was going on for too many years for it not to be known about and supported by senior management .  There must be a case for  investigating consipracy to defraud by senior management.

A proper investigation will also send a forceful message..

o	PPI has cost the tax payer perhaps ten billion pounds
o	No criminal investigation has been conducted
o	No one has been prosecuted
o	The SFO has indicated it does not wish to examine the issues
o	Such a major failure merits a proper criminal investigation
o	Even if ultimately the investigation fails it will signal intent to pursue white collar criminals as far as can be done when they steal from the public
o	We therefore call for proper resources to be made available to investigate PPI and associated conspiracies to defraud.
